pkgmetadata.longdescription: RetroShare is a Open Source cross-platform, Friend-2-Friend and secure decentralised communication platform. It lets you to securely chat and share files with your friends and family, using a web-of-trust to authenticate peers and OpenSSL to encrypt all communication. RetroShare provides filesharing, chat, messages, forums and channels

use.flag: Enables the CLI version of RetroShare
Enables potentially insecure autologin capability via Gnome Keyring
Enables the GUI version of RetroShare
